prusti_rustc::env

Function prusti_rustc::env::set_current_dir1.0.0[−][src]

pub fn set_current_dir<P>(path: P) -> Result<(), Error> where
    P: AsRef<Path>, 
Expand description

Changes the current working directory to the specified path.

Returns an Err if the operation fails.

Examples

use std::env;
use std::path::Path;

let root = Path::new("/");
assert!(env::set_current_dir(&root).is_ok());
println!("Successfully changed working directory to {}!", root.display());
